title: Never getting icons
body: I have been playing league for a while now. One of my favorite things to do was collect summoner icons.I always thought summoner icons were really cool.    Unfortunately, I can't anymore because whenever I try to get one from doing something on the website(na.leagueoflegends.com) I never get the icon. If started with the star guardian icons and now the all star icons. I did the quiz for the star guardian and voted for my all stars and I till haven't gotten any of the icons. Plz help I very sad.{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: how to send ticket.I have never used boards before.
Hey there! You can shoot us a ticket [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). We'd be happy to check out your account and make any adjustments/icon grants that you've earned!
ps; i loveeee icons too! :D  i recently reached 200!:D
send in a ticket to riot. :)
